page.title: 04THE PEOPLE OF BRANDON
page.content: Over 100 people were interviewed about their opinions of Brandon today. They had either lived here all their lives or moved here because of work or marriage.Most liked the area and thought facilities for all ages adequate.However the younger ones did not think they have enough facilities. All agreed that once the sports centre was completed in October 1985, facilities would greatly improve,but many wished the centre had included a swimming pool.Most shopped for food at the "Co-op", for clothes in Durham,and for larger items in Durham or Newcastle.They thought the biggest changes they had seen were the closing of the coal mines,closing of the station and thus the disappearance of the railway line, and the growth of new housing estates.
